title: Postdoc Position on thermo-chemo-electro-mechanical modelling of solid oxide electrolysis cells to explore the impact of increasing cell size on cell performance and mechanical stability
job_description: Job descriptionAn important aspect in realizing SOE technology as an economically viable technology, is the level of scale-up of the technology to meet the requirements of industrial implementation..
employer_description: At the University of Twente, we are pioneers in fusing technology, science and engineering with social sciences to impact the world around us.
